metadata.title: Personalized Locked Hearts Necklace with Name Initial Necklaces Engraved 2-4 Names Custom Mother's Love Heart Necklace Pendant Jewelry Gifts forMother's Day Valentine's Day
features: 【Any Name Can Be Customized】: Every stylish woman should have a custom nameplate necklace in her jewelry box, the quirky look of this personalized name necklace will keep someone forever in our minds and hearts.

【Hypo-Allergic Material】: The custom name necklace is made of high quality stainless steel that won't peel, rub off or discolor. anyone can wear without worrying about any allergic reaction to the name necklace.

【Signifiacant and Personalized Gifts】: Personalized necklaces can be a special gift for your lover, boyfriend or girlfriend, best friend or family member for birthdays, christmas, mother's day, father's day, thanksgiving and valentine's day festival.
【How to Customize Your Own Necklace】: 1 - Choose your favorite pendant style. 2 - Click Customize Now to personalize. 3 - Enter your initials to preview and add it to the basket.

【The Perfect Shopping Experience】: We are committed to providing the best customer service. If you are not satisfied with the product or the product is damaged, please contact us. we offer a 30-day return policy.
description: Feature： 1. Custom your name on your necklace is a meaningful thing 2. The necklace will not deform and fade easily, a meaningful personal souvenir 3. Perfect for expressing your love, commitment, family or friendship with the lucky recipient Description： Multile Color Selection: Silver, Gold, Rose Gold Style: Personalized, Fashionable and Exquisite Metal: stainless steel Chain Length: 16-20 inches Package List： 1 x Necklace（Chain & Pendant） 1x Jewelry box Note: 1、Actual color may be slightly different from the image due to different monitor and light effect. 2、Please allow slight measurement deviations due to manual measurement.
